design_system.name: PitchFire Ember OS

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF4500] text-white hover:bg-[#FF8C00] rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,69,0,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#FF4500] text-[#FF4500] hover:bg-[#FF4500]/10 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-[#FF4500]/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: bg-[#121212] border-white/10 focus:border-[#FF4500] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#FF4500] text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 rounded-sm

visual_enhancers.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")
visual_enhancers.particles: Use tsparticles for subtle ember effects in hero sections

motion.scroll_reveal: Use framer-motion for scroll-triggered opacity/y-axis reveals

assets.icons: Use lucide-react (default) or @phosphor-icons/react for marketing pages

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Implement the 'Barlow Condensed' font for all headings. This is the core of the brand identity.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Noise' texture overlay on the main background to prevent the 'flat digital' look.
CRITICAL: Do not use pure black (#000000). Use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
CRITICAL: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background. Use 'text-gray-400' for secondary text, not darker.
CRITICAL: For the 'Fire' effect, use gradients of Orange (#FF4500) and Gold (#FFD700). Do not use red alone.
CRITICAL: Dashboard grids must be dense (gap-4). Marketing grids must be loose (gap-12).
CRITICAL: Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications.
CRITICAL: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Create depth with z-index and glassmorphism.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
